items.title: Police arrest 26-year-old suspect in connection with UnitedHealthcare CEO killing
items.author: Associated Press
items.content: Police have arrested a 26-year-old “strong person of interest” in the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, New York’s police commissioner Jessica Tisch said Monday. #shorts #UnitedHealthcare #CEO #crime #breakingnews

items.title: Trump says he can’t guarantee tariffs won’t raise US prices
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
In a wide-ranging interview with NBC on Sunday, president-elect Donald Trump said he can’t guarantee that his promised tariffs won’t raise prices for American consumers. He also touched on deportations and Ukraine. (AP video produced by Serkan Gurbuz). Read more: https://bit.ly/3Dj0nlt 

#trump #news #tariffs 
Photo credit: Pool Reuters

items.title: Police arrest 26-year-old man in connection with UnitedHealthcare CEO killing
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Police arrested a 26-year-old man on Monday in the Manhattan killing of United Healthcare’s CEO after they say a Pennsylvania McDonald's worker alerted authorities to a customer who resembled the suspected gunman. (AP Video: Joseph B. Frederick, David R. Martin, Jessie Wardarski). Read more: https://bit.ly/4iuZVky 

#news #unitedhealthcare 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: LIVE: Press conference after man arrested in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Live press conference after the suspect in the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson has been charged with weapons, forgery and other charges in Pennsylvania after being arrested at a McDonald’s on Monday morning.

The 26-year-old suspect, identified by police as Luigi Nicholas Mangione, began shaking when police asked if he had been in New York recently, court records said. He is scheduled to go before a judge in western Pennsylvania where he was being held on gun charges. 

#news #unitedhealthcare #live

items.title: Nobel Peace Prize 2024: Nihon Hidankyo, Hiroshima and Nagasaki survivors, speaks in Norway
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
The 2024 Nobel Peace Prize laureate Nihon Hidankyo’s representative, Terumi Tanaka, holds a news conference at the Norwegian Nobel Institute.
Hidankyo was awarded for its decades-long activism against nuclear weapons. The 30 survivors, known as hibakusha, see the prize and the international attention as a last chance to get their message to younger generations.



#nobelpeaceprize #NihonHidankyo #TerumiTanaka #norway #hiroshima #nagasaki #japan #news #live

items.title: Shapiro hails 'hero' who notified police about suspect in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Police have arrested a suspect in the brazen Manhattan killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO after a quick-thinking McDonald’s customer and an employee in Pennsylvania alerted authorities to a customer who was found with a weapon, mask and writings linking him to the ambush. Police said the 26-year-old suspect, identified by police as Luigi Nicholas Mangione, was taken into custody Monday after police got a tip from a quick-thinking employee. (AP Video by Ted Shaffrey).

#news #unitedhealthcare  

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

items.title: Daniel Penny acquitted in NYC subway chokehold case over Jordan Neely's death
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
A Marine veteran who put an agitated subway rider in a chokehold on a New York subway has been acquitted in the man’s death. On Monday, a Manhattan jury cleared Daniel Penny on Monday of criminally negligent homicide charges. (AP video: Joseph Frederick/Production: Vanessa A. Alvarez).

#news

items.title: Tulsi Gabbard says she's in 'full support' with Trump on Syria
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
President-elect Donald Trump’s pick for intelligence chief Tulsi Gabbard is facing fresh scrutiny about her proximity to Russian-ally Syria amid that country’s sudden collapse of its hardline Assad regime. Read more: https://bit.ly/3ZJg1Q4

items.title: Syrians search notorious Saydnaya prison for their loved ones
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
In a rare moment of unity in a country torn apart by over a decade of war, Syrians flocked to Saydnaya looking for answers. They rushed to the military prison after news broke that their long-time leader, Bashar Assad, had fallen. Read more: https://bit.ly/4gr8RWc 

#syria #news

items.title: US believes journalist Austin Tice is alive after disappearing in Syria in 2012, Biden says
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
President Joe Biden says the U.S. government believes missing American journalist Austin Tice, who disappeared 12 years ago near the Syrian capital, is alive and Washington is committed to bringing him home after Bashar Assad’s ouster from power. Read more: https://bit.ly/3ONwnkg 

#syria #austintice

items.title: Syrian refugees wait at Turkish border, eager to return home after fall of Assad's government
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Hundreds of Syrian refugees gathered at a border crossing in southern Turkey on Monday, eagerly anticipating their return home following the fall of President Bashar Assad’s government. Many arrived at the two crossings, Cilvegozu and Oncupinar, at daybreak, draped in blankets and coats. Read more: https://bit.ly/3OPE1KU
(AP Video shot by Mehmet Guzel/Mucahit Ceylan)

#syria #turkey #assad #news 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

items.title: Pristina’s Christmas market transforms the city into a winter wonderland
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Pristina’s Christmas market has transformed Kosovo's capital into a sparkling winter wonderland. One of the largest in the region, the festive market stretches over one kilometre (0.6 miles) across the city centre. (AP video by Florent Bajrami)

#christmas #kosovo #holidays

items.title: LIVE: View from Damascus, Syria
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Live from Umayyad Square in Damascus after a rebel advance reached the capital, ending the Assad family’s 50-year rule. Russian state news agencies reported that ousted Syrian leader Bashar Assad and his family have arrived in Moscow and received asylum. Read more: https://bit.ly/49sSpCk 

#damascus #syria #basharalassad #news #live
